languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, позвольте высказаться и мне. Я благодарен вам за дозволение служить под вашим началом. Доказательства против рода Версериан серьезные, но их виновность видится мне... сомнительной. Если вы примете решение разобраться в этом вопросе лично, прошу вас, поговорите со мной. Возможно, я смогу быть вам полезен".

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость, позвольте высказаться и мне. Я благодарен вам за дозволение служить под вашим началом. Доказательства против рода Версериан серьезные, но их виновность видится мне... сомнительной. Если вы примите решение разобраться в этом вопросе лично, прошу вас, поговорите со мной. Возможно, я смогу быть вам полезен".
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to speak as well. I am grateful for the privilege of serving under you. The evidence against House Werserian is quite solid, but I... doubt their culpability. Should you decide to personally resolve this case, then I humbly ask you to speak to me. Perhaps I can be of use to you."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, позвольте высказаться и мне. Я благодарен вам за дозволение служить под вашим началом. Доказательства против рода Версериан серьезные, но их виновность видится мне... сомнительной. Если вы примете решение разобраться в этом вопросе лично, прошу вас, поговорите со мной. Возможно, я смогу быть вам полезен".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to speak as well. I am grateful for the privilege to serve under you. The evidence against the House Werserian is quite solid, but I... doubt their culpability. If you decide to personally resolve this case, then I humbly ask you to speak with me. Perhaps I can prove useful to your case."
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to speak as well. I am grateful for the privilege of serving under you. The evidence against House Werserian is quite solid, but I... doubt their culpability. Should you decide to personally resolve this case, then I humbly ask you to speak to me. Perhaps I can be of use to you."
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: 「陛下、私にも発言をお許しください。陛下の下で働けることに感謝いたします。ウェルザリアン家の反逆を示す証拠は極めて強固ですが、私は…ウェルザリアン家の責任とは思えないのです。もし、この件を御自ら解決するおつもりなら、私にお声がけください。お役に立てることでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to speak as well. I am grateful for the privilege of serving under you. The evidence against House Werserian is quite solid, but I... doubt their culpability. Should you decide to personally resolve this case, then I humbly ask you to speak to me. Perhaps I can be of use to you."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、私にも発言をお許しください。陛下の下で働けることに感謝いたします。ウェルザリアン家の反逆を示す証拠は極めて強固ですが、私は…ウェルザリアン家の責任とは思えないのです。もし、この件を御自ら解決するおつもりなら、私にお声がけください。お役に立てることでしょう」
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: “大人，我也有些话想说。我很荣幸能够为您服务。指控韦尔森家族的证据看似无懈可击，但我……我怀疑其中另有隐情。如果您决定亲自调查本案，我恳请您与我谈谈，或许我能为您提供有用的线索。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to speak as well. I am grateful for the privilege of serving under you. The evidence against House Werserian is quite solid, but I... doubt their culpability. Should you decide to personally resolve this case, then I humbly ask you to speak to me. Perhaps I can be of use to you."

traits.locale_text: “大人，我也有些话想说。我很荣幸能够为您服务。指控韦尔森家族的证据看似无懈可击，但我……我怀疑其中另有隐情。如果您决定亲自调查本案，我恳请您与我谈一谈，或许我能为您提供有用的线索。”
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, si vous le permettez. Je vous suis reconnaissant de m'avoir accordé le privilège de vous servir. Les preuves contre la maison Werserian ont l'air solides, mais... je ne peux m'empêcher de douter de sa culpabilité. Si vous décidez de résoudre vous-même toute cette affaire, alors je vous demande humblement de bien vouloir venir m'en parler. Je ferai en sorte de vous être utile. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to speak as well. I am grateful for the privilege of serving under you. The evidence against House Werserian is quite solid, but I... doubt their culpability. Should you decide to personally resolve this case, then I humbly ask you to speak to me. Perhaps I can be of use to you."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, si vous le permettez. Je vous suis reconnaissant de m'avoir accordé le privilège de vous servir directement. Les preuves contre la maison Werserian ont l'air solides, mais... je ne peux m'empêcher de douter de sa culpabilité. Si vous décidez de résoudre vous-même toute cette affaire, alors je vous demande humblement de bien vouloir venir m'en parler. Je pourrais peut-être vous être utile. »
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, permítame decir unas palabras. Agradezco el privilegio de servirl{mf|e|a}. Las pruebas que inculpan a la casa Werserian son bastante concluyentes, pero... dudo de su culpabilidad. Si decide ocuparse de este caso personalmente, le pido que acuda a mí. Podría ser de ayuda».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to speak as well. I am grateful for the privilege of serving under you. The evidence against House Werserian is quite solid, but I... doubt their culpability. Should you decide to personally resolve this case, then I humbly ask you to speak to me. Perhaps I can be of use to you."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, permítame decir unas palabras. Agradezco el privilegio de servir durante su mandato. Las evidencias que inculpan a la casa Werserian son bastante concluyentes, pero... dudo de su culpabilidad. Si decide ocuparse de este caso personalmente, le pido que acuda a mí. Podría ser de ayuda».
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, gestattet auch mir zu sprechen. Ich bin dankbar für das Privileg, unter Euch dienen zu dürfen. Die Beweise gegen Haus Werserian wirken recht robust, doch ich .. habe Zweifel an ihrer Schuld. Solltet Ihr entscheiden, den Fall persönlich zu untersuchen, so bitte ich demütig darum, dass Ihr mit mir sprecht. Vielleicht kann ich Euch nützlich sein."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to speak as well. I am grateful for the privilege of serving under you. The evidence against House Werserian is quite solid, but I... doubt their culpability. Should you decide to personally resolve this case, then I humbly ask you to speak to me. Perhaps I can be of use to you."

traits.locale_text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, gestattet auch mir zu sprechen. Ich bin dankbar für das Privileg, unter Euch dienen zu dürfen. Die Beweise gegen Haus Werserian wirken recht robust, doch ich .. habe Zweifel an ihrer Schuld. Solltet Ihr entscheiden, den Fall persönlich zu untersuchen, so bitte ich demütig darum, dass Ihr mit mir sprecht. Vielleicht kann ich behilflich sein."
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, izninizle ben de düşüncelerimi ifade edeyim. Sizin emrinizde hizmet etmekten memnuniyet duymaktayım. Werserian Hanesi aleyhinde yapılan ithamlar yersiz değil ama... Asılsız olmaları mümkündür. Bu meseleyle bizzat ilgilenmek isterseniz rica ederim benimle konuşun. Bu hususta size faydam dokunabilir."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to speak as well. I am grateful for the privilege of serving under you. The evidence against House Werserian is quite solid, but I... doubt their culpability. Should you decide to personally resolve this case, then I humbly ask you to speak to me. Perhaps I can be of use to you."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, izninizle ben de düşüncelerimi ifade edeyim. Sizin emrinizde hizmet etmekten memnuniyet duymaktayım. Werserian Hanesi aleyhinde yapılan ithamlar yersiz değil ama... asılsız olmaları mümkün. Bu meseleyle bizzat ilgilenmek isterseniz rica ederim benimle konuşun. Size faydam dokunabilir."
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak
